entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 11 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
